column4: Hi, I installed Ubuntu side-by-side with Windows. Now I want Ubuntu gone, how do I do this? (It wasn't a Wubi install)
restore MBR if grub was installed to it, remove linux partition, done
mbr, master boot record, to be fixed with i.e. fixmbr from windows-cd
if grub made a backup of the original one, dd it back. else use fixmbr from windows-cd
what if i don't have the windows-cd?
:\, I think the old grub? it was a 9.10 install
..everytime you guys give me an answer it unleashes more questions
sudo aptitude install testdisk && man testdisk
Is it possible to do it from Windows?
or must i do it on linux?
